name: GYRATING
description:
No bird,no ninja,but yourself! Rolling your box to catch the boxes falling down.
Remember one thing, Match the color both is the only rule!
It's a perfect new casual endless game with just easy control and much fun.
It seems not difficult,but makes you crazy!
Come on! Be patient! Challenge the impossible!

FEATURES:
1.simple control,intuitive!
2.addictive gameplay!
3.challenge the best score!
4.just two control! right and left!
5.Fresh color and eyes protection
6.iPhone,iPad and iPod support
